verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shalt arise \w a|strong="H1961"\w* different colour \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* blister, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* something shining, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* place where \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w appears|strong="H4758"\w* lower than \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H5061"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* \w of|strong="H5061"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* judgment \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* separated.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* shining whiteness \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lower \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* former colour, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* leprosy \w be|strong="H3808"\w* grown \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w farther|strong="H6581"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* itself \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w again|strong="H8145"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* leprosy \w be|strong="H3808"\w* somewhat obscure, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* declare \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w scab|strong="H4556"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* leprosy grow \w again|strong="H8145"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H3548"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* restored \w to|strong="H0413"\w* cleanness, \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* brought \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*,
\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* condemned \w of|strong="H3548"\w* uncleanness.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* \w of|strong="H5061"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*. \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* colour \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w itself|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w*:

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w an|strong="H3588"\w* inveterate \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* grown into \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* declare \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* evidently \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w spring|strong="H5869"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* running \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* falleth under \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* judge \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H5061"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* very \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*: \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* whiteness, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* therefore \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w*,

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* judgment \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* reckoned \w among|strong="H2931"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*: \w for|strong="H2930"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w spotted|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* whiteness, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* cover all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w*,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* judge \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ulcer \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* ulcer, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* appeareth \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* scar, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* somewhat red, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* place \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* other flesh, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* declare \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, \w for|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* broken \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ulcer.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* former colour, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* scar somewhat obscure, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* flesh \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* near \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w spread|strong="H6581"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* judge \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* leprosy:

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w its|strong="H5975"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w scar|strong="H6867"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w an|strong="H0518"\w* ulcer, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* man \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w also|strong="H0176"\w* \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* burnt, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* healed hath \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* red scar,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* place thereof \w is|strong="H1931"\w* lower \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* other \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* declare \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*, \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* evil \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* broken \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* scar.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* colour \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* changed, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* blemish \w lower|strong="H8217"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* flesh, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* appearance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* leprosy \w be|strong="H3117"\w* somewhat obscure, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* grown \w farther|strong="H6581"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* declare \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.
